title: GET_PED_SOURCE_OF_DAMAGE
content:
0x535DB43F// GetPedSourceOfDamage
Entity GET_PED_SOURCE_OF_DAMAGE(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target pedReturns: The entity id. Returns 0 if the ped has not been damaged recently.Get the last entity that damaged the ped. This native is used server side when using OneSync.
